title: sweet potato tahini bowl
ingredients: 1 small to medium sweet potato; rinsed and halved
(optional) 1 green onion; sliced on a bias
instructions: Cook potato in microwave - 5â€“7 minutes on full power (1200W).
Slice into potato with a crosshatch pattern, then lightly season with salt and drizzle with olive oil.
Top with eggs, split in half.
Tuck in any avocado and sprinkle green onion.
Finish with a few cracks of pepper on top.
notes: - serves 1 - The 9 minute egg cook is a just-set, almost molten yolk. - I cook and eat this in the Anyday small, deep bowl. - Can also substitute a baked sweet potato.
